content.prompt: Which of the following developments could best be used as evidence to support Stevensâ€™ claim about African American suffrage in the last paragraph of the excerpt?

choices.label: Republican candidates won most presidential electoral votes in the North in the late 1860s and 1870s.
Many Northern business leaders supported the Republican Party during Reconstruction.
Democrats dominated the Southern states after suppressing African American voting rights.
President Ulysses S. Grant used federal authority to counter voter intimidation in the South.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
